date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:

    reference_docx: style-ref.docx
params:
  data: 1
  data2: 1
 
---
  


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = F, warning = F)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(gridExtra)


data_raw <- params$data %>%
  group_by(분류1) %>%
  summarise(사용병상 = sum(사용병상), 가용병상 = sum(가용병상)) 

data_raw2 <- params$data
```

```{r echo=FALSE, dpi=330, fig.height=1.3}
## data
data <- data_raw %>%
  filter(분류1 == "합계") %>%
  gather(key = "상태", value = "병상수", 사용병상:가용병상) %>%
  mutate(lab.ypos = cumsum(병상수) - 0.5*병상수)

## pie1
pie1 <- ggplot(data, aes(x = 2, y = 병상수, fill = 상태)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "white") +
  coord_polar(theta = "y", start = 0) +
  geom_text(
    aes(y = lab.ypos, 
        label = paste0(data$상태, "\n", data$병상수, "/", sum(data$병상수))
    ),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangR",
    size = 1.5
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#4d80e4", "#e5dfdf")) +
  theme_void() +
  xlim(.5, 2.5) +
  labs(
    title = "전체 병상 가동률"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 8, family = "GyeonggiBatangB"),
    text = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR")
  ) +
  annotate(
    geom = 'text', 
    x = 0.5, y = 0, 
    label = paste0(round(data$병상수[1]/sum(data$병상수)*100, 1), "%"),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangB",
    size = 3.5
  )

# data2
data <- data_raw %>%
  filter(분류1 == "중환자실") %>%
  gather(key = "상태", value = "병상수", 사용병상:가용병상) %>%
  mutate(lab.ypos = cumsum(병상수) - 0.5*병상수)

# pie2
pie2 <- ggplot(data, aes(x = 2, y = 병상수, fill = 상태)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "white") +
  coord_polar(theta = "y", start = 0) +
  geom_text(
    aes(y = lab.ypos, 
        label = paste0(data$상태, "\n", data$병상수, "/", sum(data$병상수))
    ),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangR",
    size = 1.5
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#db4455", "#e5dfdf")) +
  theme_void() +
  xlim(.5, 2.5) +
  labs(
    title = "중환자실 가동률"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 8, family = "GyeonggiBatangB"),
    text = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR")
  ) +
  annotate(
    geom = 'text', 
    x = 0.5, y = 0, 
    label = paste0(round(data$병상수[1]/sum(data$병상수)*100, 1), "%"),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangB",
    size = 3.5
  )

data1 <- params$data2 %>%
  mutate(가용객실수 = 총객실 - 사용객실) %>%
  select(c("센터명", "사용객실", "가용객실수"))
colnames(data1) <- c("병원명", "사용병상", "가용병상")
data1 <- data1 %>%
  gather(key = "상태", value = "병상수", 사용병상:가용병상) %>%
  group_by(상태) %>%
  summarise(병상수 = sum(병상수)) %>%
  mutate(lab.ypos = cumsum(병상수) - 0.5*병상수)

pie3 <- ggplot(data1, aes(x = 2, y = 병상수, fill = 상태)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "white") +
  coord_polar(theta = "y", start = 0) +
  geom_text(
    aes(y = lab.ypos, 
        label = paste0(data1$상태, "\n", data1$병상수, "/", sum(data1$병상수))
    ),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangR",
    size = 1.5
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#db4455", "#e5dfdf")) +
  theme_void() +
  xlim(.5, 2.5) +
  labs(
    title = "생활치료센터 가동률"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 8, family = "GyeonggiBatangB"),
    text = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR")
  ) +
  annotate(
    geom = 'text', 
    x = 0.5, y = 0, 
    label = paste0(round(data1$병상수[1]/sum(data1$병상수)*100, 1), "%"),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangB",
    size = 3.5
  )

grid.arrange(pie1, pie2, pie3, nrow = 1)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, dpi=330, fig.height=1.5, warning=FALSE}
## Bar Graph1 ----
data <- data_raw2 %>%
  filter(분류1 == "합계") %>%
  gather("가용", "병상수", 사용병상:가용병상) %>%
  mutate(가용 = factor(가용, level = c("사용병상", "가용병상"), ordered = TRUE))

bar1 <- data %>%
  ggplot(aes(병원명, 병상수, fill = 가용)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(
    aes(label = ifelse(병상수 != 0, 병상수, NA)), 
    position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangR",
    size = 2
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#e5dfdf", "#4d80e4")) +
  labs(
    title = "병원별 병상운용 현황",
    x = "",
    y = ""
  ) +
  theme_void(base_family = "GyeonggiBatangR") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    legend.text = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR", size = 5),
    legend.title = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR", size = 5),
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 8, family = "GyeonggiBatangB"),
    text = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 0.7, family = "GyeonggiBatangR", size = 5),
  )

data <- data_raw2 %>%
  filter(분류1 == "중환자실") %>%
  filter(병원명 %in% c("성남의료원", "분당서울대", "명지병원", "고려대안산", "순천향부천", "아주대병원", "한림대성심", "일산병원")) %>%
  gather("가용", "병상수", 사용병상:가용병상) %>%
  mutate(가용 = factor(가용, level = c("사용병상", "가용병상"), ordered = TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(병원명 = factor(병원명, levels = c("성남의료원", "분당서울대", "명지병원", "고려대안산", "순천향부천", "아주대병원", "한림대성심", "일산병원")))

bar2 <- data %>%
  ggplot(aes(병원명, 병상수, fill = 가용)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(
    aes(label = ifelse(병상수 != 0, 병상수, NA)), 
    position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5),
    family = "GyeonggiBatangR",
    size = 2
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#e5dfdf", "#db4455")) +
  labs(
    title = "중환자실 운용 현황",
    x = "",
    y = ""
  ) +
  theme_void(base_family = "GyeonggiBatangR") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    legend.text = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR", size = 5),
    legend.title = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR", size = 5),
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 8, family = "GyeonggiBatangB"),
    text = element_text(family = "GyeonggiBatangR"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 0.8, family = "GyeonggiBatangR", size = 5)
  )


grid.arrange(bar1, bar2, widths = c(0.7, 0.3), nrow = 1)
```
